name: RollAppbyGaposa
0:
”Alexa Open Office Window”
”Alexa Close Office Window”
”Alexa What Mode is Office Window”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Convenient control of your 100% Italian made Gaposa motors with the Roll.App will allow you to organize your shades into rooms and select favorite rooms, set day/night schedules to automate daylight management, and use your voice to operate your shades with Amazon Alexa.

To Use:

Enable the Alexa In RollApp - User Profile / Preferences
Add this Skill to Alexa
Register for a voice assistant account using the same email address as RollApp
Sign into link Alexa with RollApp
Accept the prompt for discovery.
Your shades will be named - Room Name Shade Name - Example Office Window
Follow the example phrases changing the Shade Name to match those configured in RollApp
